title: Because of the Angels, or, Steel-Manning Unitarianism, Universalism, and Trinitarianism
description: Jeff sort of moderates as Charlie tries to steel-man Sam's Biblical Unitarian position, Luke's Universalism stance, and then offers critiques.  After that Sam attempts to steel-man Trinitarianism in this mix of would-be 'anti-debate' and converZation.
